title: The Best Women’s Slippers on Amazon, According to Hyperenthusiastic Reviewers
text:
Photo: Gary John Norman/Getty Images

Here at the Strategist, we like to think of ourselves as crazy (in the good way) about the stuff we buy, but as much as we’d like to, we can’t try everything. Which is why we have People’s Choice, in which we find the best-reviewed (that’s four-to-five-star reviews and lots of ’em) products and single out the most convincing. We’ve already sought out the best men’s slippers on Amazon, asked a homebody about her favorite house slippers, and singled out the best unisex wool slippers, so now we’re feeling out the coziest women’s slippers you can find on Amazon (note that reviews have been edited for length and clarity).

Best sheepskin slippers

UGG Women’s Scuffette Slippers 4.3 stars, 780 reviews “Searched for the ultimate in comfort and style in a house slipper … now I’ve found it!!! I was hesitant to pay the price, but now I’m sooo glad I did. This shoe will most likely last me for the rest of my life . It is totally comfortable, stays on my foot snugly, and doesn’t slip and slide; the sole is just right for stepping outside for the mail, and is quiet and secure on hardwood floors. This slipper is my ‘go-to’ shoe after a hard day of standing on my feet.” From $85 at Amazon Buy

Best shearling slippers

Acorn Women’s Moc Slipper 4.2 stars, 1,787 reviews “These slippers are fantastic. I wear them to keep me warm in the house, and I wear them outside. I have even worn them to the supermarket. I have even worn them when it rains. I wash and dry them, and they’re still wearable, after two years, without the uppers coming apart from the sides. For $40, you just can’t beat how well they’re made.” From $31 at Amazon Buy

Best fleece slippers

Luxehome Women’s Cozy Fleece Slippers 4.5 stars, 1,052 reviews “These are extremely comfortable. I needed some house shoes that provided support and cushion on hardwood floors, and these do a great job. They’re incredibly soft and give the right amount of cushion. They have a hard sole, so they can be worn outside if needed and provide traction.” From $15 at Amazon Buy

Best faux-fur slippers

Sorel Women’s Nakiska Slipper 4.6 stars, 1,501 reviews “My feet were cold at home, so I ordered these slippers to wear around the house in the winter. These slippers are warm and cozy and look great on. They are nicely stitched suede with a 50 percent wool, 50 percent polyester lining. They have a cushioned feel to them. You do not feel like you are barefoot as you might in less substantial slippers. I put them on the minute I step in the house and don’t take them off again until bedtime.” From $24 at Amazon Buy

Best wool slippers

Haflinger Women’s AS20 Slipper 4.4 stars, 176 reviews “As comfortable as ever. These are all I wear for slippers in the winter. Have been for years. Great arch support yet not stiff and confining.” From $79 at Amazon Buy

Best memory-foam slippers

Women’s Soft Slip-on Memory Foam Slippers 4.5 stars, 1,522 reviews “I love these so much. I got two pairs — one for my mom and one for me, and she loved them. They fit perfectly and snugly. They are very comfy and have a nice plushy bottom. I like the hard sole as well.” From $19 at Amazon Buy

Best moccasin slippers

Minnetonka Chrissy Slipper Bootie 4.2 stars, 532 reviews “I am so happy with these slippers! I have the standard Minnetonka slipper, but I’ve had them forever and wear them every day, so I figured it was time for a replacement. I’m so happy I went with the bootie. Having your ankle and the top of your foot covered makes all the difference in the world for level of warmth, and the insides of these are SO soft.” $42 at Amazon Buy

Best indoor or outdoor slippers

Clppli Women’s Slippers With a Faux Fur Trim 4.3 stars, 2,097 reviews “I’m a slipper hoarder, and I got these specifically so I can comfortably go outside with my dog — something with soles on the bottom. They are AMAZINGLY comfortable. They’re well-made, and they have heavy rubber on the bottom, so you can wear them outside. The fur inside is warm and so soft. Winter is coming! Get these!!” From $20 at Amazon Buy

Best slipper socks

World’s Softest Cozy Slippers 4.3 stars, 1,925 reviews “We’re a no-shoes house, so I’ve had occasion to own many slippers. These truly are the most comfortable slippers I’ve ever had — very warm, soft, and with plenty of room inside. They’re also easy to put on and take off, and the elastic band at the opening keeps them from falling off unintentionally. Lastly, the slippers are ambidextrous, so there’s no need to match a slipper to a particular foot.” From $15 at Amazon Buy

Best ballerina slippers

Isotoner Women’s Terry Ballerina Slipper 4.2 stars, 1,529 reviews “I really love these slippers! Comfortable, washable, and lightweight, but have a substantial sole and fairly thick padding inside. The terry fabric gives, so if you have bunions or crazy-shaped feet, you’ll still be comfortable. The fit around the top is snug, but it’s not uncomfortable, and they stay on your feet.” From $16 at Amazon Buy

Best flip-flop slippers

Acorn Women’s Spa Thong Slipper 4.3 stars, 491 reviews “I love these slippers! They’re so soft. It may sound like an exaggeration, but I get a relaxed, happy feeling as I slide my feet through them. Yeah, I do. They have a nice, level, ‘half-inch off the floor’ support, which is great because I don’t like to feel as if I’m walking on the sand at the beach.” From $26 at Amazon Buy

Best open-toe slippers

Home Ideas Women’s Open-Toe Terry Cloth Slippers 4 stars, 300 reviews “These are very soft and have a cushioned bottom. They have the bottom that keeps you from slipping. I am someone who doesn’t like to be hot at all, and they aren’t warm enough to be an issue. They are pretty perfect and the price was just right. I highly recommend them to everyone.” From $15 at Amazon Buy

Best slipper boots

Acorn Women’s Slouch Boot Slipper 4.2 stars, 178 reviews “These are my favorite slipper boots that I’ve tried. I have been wearing them daily since I received them. The elastic at the top of the sock part is good. Not too tight, yet snug enough to keep them exactly where I put them. The sole is substantial for walking yet soft for lounging. I’ve been recommending them to all my family and friends.” From $46 at Amazon Buy

Best slipper booties

Acorn Faux Chinchilla Slipper Bootie $39 (was $55, now 29% off) 4.2 stars, 1,054 reviews “These Acorn slippers are THE WARMEST slippers, not to mention the soft padding in the bottom that makes you feel like you are walking on a cloud, and the fuzzy inner lining. Another feature I liked about these slippers was the rubber sole. I don’t have to be afraid of ruining the bottom of my slippers when I go on the porch or take a bag of trash outside. Also, I am not the most graceful person, so I need all the traction I can get.” From $39 at Amazon Buy

description: The best women’s slippers on Amazon includes moccasins, sheepskin styles, slipper socks and slipper boots — from Acorns to UGGs and Sorels.
